channel.title: [PI] Completing message
channel.description:
Hi people, I've made achievements in my server but I have just 1 problem. Whenever players complete the achievement it does nothing. For example. 1 achievement says you need to hit 50+ How do I make it so that it does this, and where would I add this.:
[code]c.sendMessage("@red@You have completed the achievement: Godly touch."); c.achievement2 = 1;[/code]
